EmailTemplate.name: Warranty - Shop Warranty Verification
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject} : {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for contacting Honeywell Aerospace Customer Support. Your case tracking number for this inquiry is provided above. If you wish to communicate with us further about this inquiry, you may reply to this e-mail -- please leave the Reference Case # within the subject line for quicker responses.
We have reviewed the applicable warranty terms for the information provided.
This equipment is:
[ ] Within the Shop/Repair Warranty Period [ ] Outside the Shop/Repair Warranty Period
Shop warranty only applies to the labor/material related to previous repair. If unrelated, quote customer. Technician to change program code to CNA if quote is required.
Warranty terms were updated in SAP, on Tcode IQ03+Extended Data tab. Check for Warranty Start Date and Warranty Terms in the Master Warranty field. Where the Warranty End Date is missing, calculate the end date based on the months associated to the Master Warranty field.
To calculate the end date follow the next instructions:
Technician should change program to the applicable Shop Warranty code.
Please note that our review is based on the applicable contract terms. Final warranty decision will depend on the equipment condition/failure mode determined by the repair technician.
Thank you, we appreciate your business!
Honeywell Aerospace
Customer & Product Support
Web: http://www.MyAerospace.com
